title: Self-Directed Culture-Based Social Studies VR Simulation Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Regional cultural experience and value analysis activities using VR devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three social values of local cultures (e.g., mutual consideration, integrity) through VR simulations.
Learners can analyze cultural data collected from context-based research and propose two types of social value models using scientific methods.
Learners can evaluate three implementation outcomes in experimental report format while performing culture-based decision-making tasks in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
